lyrics.JpnStr: 正[ただ]しさとは 愚[おろ]かさとは
lyrics.EngStr: What is righteousness? What is foolishness?

lyrics.JpnStr: それが何[なに]か見[み]せつけてやる
lyrics.EngStr: I'll show you what it really is

lyrics.JpnStr: ちっちゃな頃[ころ]から優等[ゆうとう]生[せい]
lyrics.EngStr: Since I was little, I was an honor student

lyrics.JpnStr: 気[き]づいたら大人[おとな]になっていた
lyrics.EngStr: Before I knew it, I had become an adult

lyrics.JpnStr: ナイフの様[よう]な思考[しこう]回路[かいろ]
lyrics.EngStr: A mind like a knife's edge

lyrics.JpnStr: 持[も]ち合[あ]わせる訳[わけ]もなく
lyrics.EngStr: Without any reason to possess it

lyrics.JpnStr: でも遊[あそ]び足[た]りない 何[なに]か足[た]りない
lyrics.EngStr: But it's not enough play, something's missing

lyrics.JpnStr: 困[こま]っちまうこれは誰[だれ]かのせい
lyrics.EngStr: This is troublesome, it's someone else's fault

lyrics.JpnStr: あてもなくただ混乱[こんらん]するエイデイ
lyrics.EngStr: Aimlessly just wandering through everyday

lyrics.JpnStr: それもそっか
lyrics.EngStr: That makes sense

lyrics.JpnStr: 最新[さいしん]の流行[りゅうこう]は当然[とうぜん]の把握[はあく]
lyrics.EngStr: Keeping up with the latest trends is natural

lyrics.JpnStr: 経済[けいざい]の動向[どうこう]も通勤[つうきん]時[じ]チェック
lyrics.EngStr: Checking economic trends during the commute

lyrics.JpnStr: 純情[じゅんじょう]な精神[せいしん]で入社[にゅうしゃ]しワーク
lyrics.EngStr: Working with a pure heart since joining the company

lyrics.JpnStr: 社会人[しゃかいじん]じゃ当然[とうぜん]のルールです
lyrics.EngStr: These are the natural rules of being a member of society

lyrics.JpnStr: はぁ?うっせぇうっせぇうっせぇわ
lyrics.EngStr: Huh? Shut up, shut up, shut up

lyrics.JpnStr: 貴方[あなた]が思[おも]うより健康[けんこう]です
lyrics.EngStr: I'm healthier than you think

lyrics.JpnStr: 一切合切[いっさいがっさい]凡庸[ぼんよう]な
lyrics.EngStr: Absolutely everything about you is mediocre

lyrics.JpnStr: 貴方[あなた]じゃ分[わ]からないかもね
lyrics.EngStr: You might not understand

lyrics.JpnStr: 嗚呼[ああ]よく似合[にあ]う
lyrics.EngStr: Ah, it suits you well

lyrics.JpnStr: その可[か]もなく不可[ふか]もないメロディー
lyrics.EngStr: That so-so melody

lyrics.JpnStr: うっせぇうっせぇうっせぇわ
lyrics.EngStr: Shut up, shut up, shut up

lyrics.JpnStr: 頭[あたま]の出来[でき]が違[ちが]うので問題[もんだい]はナシ
lyrics.EngStr: The quality of my mind is different, so there's no problem

lyrics.JpnStr: つっても私[わたし]模範[もはん]人間[にんげん]
lyrics.EngStr: Even so, I'm a model human

lyrics.JpnStr: 殴[なぐ]ったりするのはノーセンキュー
lyrics.EngStr: Hitting people is a no-no

lyrics.JpnStr: だったら言葉[ことば]の銃口[じゅうこう]を
lyrics.EngStr: Then I'll point the muzzle of my words

lyrics.JpnStr: その頭[あたま]に突[つ]きつけて撃[う]てば
lyrics.EngStr: At your head and shoot

lyrics.JpnStr: マジヤバない?止[と]まれやしない
lyrics.EngStr: Isn't that seriously bad? It won't stop

lyrics.JpnStr: 不平[ふへい]不満[ふまん]垂[た]れて成[な]れの果[は]て
lyrics.EngStr: Filled with complaints and dissatisfaction, ending up ruined

lyrics.JpnStr: サディスティックに変貌[へんぼう]する精神[せいしん]
lyrics.EngStr: A mind that turns sadistic

lyrics.JpnStr: クソだりぃな
lyrics.EngStr: It's damn tiring

lyrics.JpnStr: 酒[さけ]が空[あ]いたグラスあれば直[す]ぐに注[つ]ぎなさい
lyrics.EngStr: If there's an empty glass, fill it up immediately

lyrics.JpnStr: 皆[みんな]がつまみ易[やす]いように串[くし]外[はず]しなさい
lyrics.EngStr: Remove the skewers so everyone can easily pick

lyrics.JpnStr: 会計[かいけい]や注文[ちゅうもん]は先陣[せんじん]を切[き]る
lyrics.EngStr: Take the lead in paying and ordering

lyrics.JpnStr: 不文律[ふぶんりつ]最低限[さいていげん]のマナーです
lyrics.EngStr: These are the basic unwritten rules of manners

lyrics.JpnStr: はぁ?うっせぇうっせぇうっせぇわ
lyrics.EngStr: Huh? Shut up, shut up, shut up

lyrics.JpnStr: くせぇ口塞[くちふさ]げや限界[げんかい]です
lyrics.EngStr: Shut your stinking mouth, I'm at my limit

lyrics.JpnStr: 絶対[ぜったい]絶対[ぜったい]現代[げんだい]の代弁者[だいべんしゃ]は私[わたし]やろがい
lyrics.EngStr: Absolutely, absolutely, I'm the spokesperson for this era

lyrics.JpnStr: もう見飽[みあ]きたわ
lyrics.EngStr: I'm already sick of it

lyrics.JpnStr: 二番煎[にばんせん]じ言[い]い換[か]えのパロディ
lyrics.EngStr: A second-rate parody of words

lyrics.JpnStr: うっせぇうっせぇうっせぇわ
lyrics.EngStr: Shut up, shut up, shut up

lyrics.JpnStr: 丸々[まるまる]と肉付[にくづ]いたその顔面[がんめん]にバツ
lyrics.EngStr: Your plump face gets a cross mark

lyrics.JpnStr: うっせぇうっせぇうっせぇわ
lyrics.EngStr: Shut up, shut up, shut up

lyrics.JpnStr: うっせぇうっせぇうっせぇわ
lyrics.EngStr: Shut up, shut up, shut up

lyrics.JpnStr: 私[わたし]が俗[ぞく]に言[い]う天才[てんさい]です
lyrics.EngStr: I am what's commonly known as a genius

lyrics.JpnStr: うっせぇうっせぇうっせぇわ
lyrics.EngStr: Shut up, shut up, shut up

lyrics.JpnStr: 貴方[あなた]が思[おも]うより健康[けんこう]です
lyrics.EngStr: I'm healthier than you think

lyrics.JpnStr: 一切合切[いっさいがっさい]凡庸[ぼんよう]な
lyrics.EngStr: Absolutely everything about you is mediocre

lyrics.JpnStr: 貴方[あなた]じゃ分[わ]からないかもね
lyrics.EngStr: You might not understand

lyrics.JpnStr: 嗚呼[ああ]つまらねぇ
lyrics.EngStr: Ah, how boring

lyrics.JpnStr: 何回[なんかい]聞[き]かせるんだそのメモリー
lyrics.EngStr: How many times will you make me listen to that memory?

lyrics.JpnStr: うっせぇうっせぇうっせぇわ
lyrics.EngStr: Shut up, shut up, shut up

lyrics.JpnStr: アタシも大概[たいがい]だけど
lyrics.EngStr: I'm pretty much the same, but

lyrics.JpnStr: どうだっていいぜ問題[もんだい]はナシ
lyrics.EngStr: It doesn't matter, there's no problem

ListVocab: つまらない-つまらない
一切合切-いっさいがっさい
二番煎じ-にばんせんじ
可もなく不可もない-かもなくふかもない
変貌する-へんぼうする
思考回路-しこうかいろ
成れの果て-なれのはて
持ち合わせる-もちあわせる
模範人間-もはんにんげん
混乱する-こんらんする
突きつける-つきつける
